Harsha S. Bhat

Main Navigation

  • Publications︎

I am a CNRS Research Scientist working at the Laboratoire de Géologie in Ecole Normale Supérieure.

I work mainly at the interface between Earthquake Physics and Solid Mechanics making occasional excursions into Rock Mechanics, Tectonics and Seismology.

You can reach me at Laboratoire de Géologie, 24 Rue Lhomond, 75005 Paris
